body.h1: Welcome to the p2 test server
body.p: You can access all files under the "webfiles" folder in this bundle via either a "public" or "private" pseudoroot. Try the public link here
To access using a login, password, you simply use the pseudoroot "/private", and you will be asked to log in. The credentials are: user: Aladdin, password: open sesame. Try it here
